features: DUAL-USE DISH RACK: Kitusure dish drainer for kitchen counter has 2 installation methods to meet your various needs. With a self-draining board on the bottom, it can be used on the countertop to drain excess water into the sink. If the kitchen counter is small or narrow, the supporting bar of the dish rack can be pulled out to use over the sink, effectively saving you kitchen space.

ADJUSTABLE SUPPORTING BARS: This compact Kitsure drying rack for kitchen measures 13.9"L x 11.9"W x 5.1"H, and the supporting bar of the dish drying rack can be extended from 14.4" to 23.1". This Kitsure dish rack is a great space saver that fits over most sinks, especially in small kitchens. (NOTE: Please check if the size of your sink and the dish rack match before purchasing.)

PREMIUM RUSTPROOF MATERIAL: Kitsure over the sink dish drying rack is made of premium stainless steel that is durable and can effectively prevent rust and deformation. Besides, there are 4 silicone leg covers to avoid slipping and scratches. Additionally, the dish rack features a rotatable water outlet at the bottom to suit your sink in different positions.

LARGE CAPACITY FOR FAMILY USE: Kitsure over the sink dish rack and drainboard set are large enough to meet the needs of a family of 2-3 persons. This dish rack can accommodate up to 10 dishes and some bowls, glasses, and mugs. The removable cutlery holder is suitable for knives, forks, spoons, peelers, and so on. Keep your kitchen clean and organized with Kitsure now!

EASY INSTALLATION & CLEANING: Kitsure dishes drying rack contains only 3 parts, a drain rack, a cutlery holder, and a drainboard set, which is easy to install without any tools. It can also be quickly disassembled to clean. Simply wipe the rack with a damp cloth or rinse it under a running tap if needed. This Kitsure dish drying rack is your handy kitchen essential.
body.description: Is your kitchen has only limited space for your tableware? Let Kitsure dishrack helps you out! 1. Kitsure drying rack for dishes is perfect for narrow kitchens as it takes up only a little space with a large capacity. Kitsure dish drying rack is your decluttering expert in the kitchen. 2. The dish dryer rack provides you with 2 ways to use it. You can use it on a countertop with the auto-drainage system to drain the excess water into the sink or pull out the supporting bars to use it over the sink for a more space-saving option. Feel free to use it to suit your needs. 3. Kitsure dishrack on counter with drainboard features high-quality stainless steel, which is durable, sturdy, and rust-proof. Furthermore, it is also easy to clean with just a damp cloth after use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent small dish drainer
reviews.reviewText: We bought this for a condo that has a very small kitchen, and it’s perfect. It is compact and sturdy, and has a spout that directs water into the sink. Very nice product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic and Compact Solution
reviews.reviewText: The best parts about this product is that it sits down in my sink and is so compact I can easily store it when needed. Great quality, aesthetic, and value! Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very durable and sturdy drainer!
reviews.reviewText: I have always hated the flimsy and non-durable plastic drainer you get in the stores! I also have very little counter space so when I saw this double tier option for a metal dish drainer, I just knew I had to grab it! It takes up very little counter space while still allowing to place a lot of my dishes that I wait to the last minute to wash! I am very much satisfied with this item, and assembly was so easy and quick! Definitely recommended for anyone who tends to have a lot of dishes and a small kitchen!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect drying rack
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with this dish rack, quality, color, functionality. Perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I hate dish racks but this is a perfect find. It's just the right size, and not made of cheap plastic. I also love the fact that it has that movable spout to drain the water and keep my counters dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We love this small dish rack
reviews.reviewText: It is slightly smaller than our old dish rack but takes up a lot less space and still holds all our dishes. It has a rail on all sides which helps to hold more dishes. Also it drains well right into the sink. It looks nice too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars definitely only for small spaces and lightweight items
reviews.reviewText: This drying rack is attractive and compact. However, it is only for very small quantities of lightweight items, perhaps a few glasses and dishes -- and I mean lightweight dishes, not heavy stoneware-type plates. The utensil tray is **extremely** shallow. I put steak knives in with the sharp points at the bottom of the utensil holder, and it is not even deep enough to conceal the entire sharp edge of the blade. Also the utensil holder is far too small to hold more than a few items. Unless you are using plastic utensils or tiny dessert-sized forks, etc. they will be falling out of the holder because it is not deep enough to hold any weight.Okay for the price, but I use it as an additional drying rack for a few glasses etc. I would not trust its stability for anything more than that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect counter fit, clean look and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: This rack is sturdy and a perfect fit for my counter. I just wish I had the option to hang the utensil holder on the outside of the rack to maximize rack space. The holes won’t let water drip due to the angle it leans when it is hanging on the outside. I love everything else about it so definitely not a deal breaker.
Cumplió mis expectativas, llegó a tiempo, de buenos materiales y buen tamaño.

Die Geschirrablage ist sehr robust und macht einen stabilen Eindruck.Dank der Silikonfüße steht Sie sehr sicher und verrutscht nicht. Durch den beweglichen Wasserablauf kann das Wasser direkt ins Spülbecken abfließen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am really impressed by this dish drainer. I have a small kitchen and this drainer fits my sink exactly. It has a drain attached underneath which drains into the sink. It looks good and is ideal for my needs. This size is good if you don’t have a lot of dishes to wash. Don’t think this size would be good for a large family. The construction is strong and it is easy to keep clean.

reviews.reviewTitle: Llego a tiempo y corresponde al producto ofrecido. Bueno para cocina pequeña
